bugs.title: libsndfile: division by zero leading to denial of service in psf_fwrite()

bugzilla.short_desc: libsndfile: division by zero leading to denial of service in psf_fwrite()

long_desc.thetext:
A divide-by-zero may occur in libsndfile, resulting in an application crash.
Upstream commit that fixes this issue:
https://github.com/erikd/libsndfile/commit/725c7dbb95bfaf8b4bb7b04820e3a00cceea9ce6950933

Is there any reproducer to test this?

Also the link above gives me 404 error.

(In reply to Michal Hlavinka from comment #1)
> Is there any reproducer to test this?

Unfortunately I'm not aware of any, here is the corresponding upstream bug report, hope it gives a clue:

https://github.com/erikd/libsndfile/issues/92

> Also the link above gives me 404 error.

Oops, something went wrong, the correct link is:
https://github.com/erikd/libsndfile/commit/725c7dbb95bfaf8b4bb7b04820e3a00cceea9ce6

Created libsndfile tracking bugs for this issue:

Affects: fedora-all [bug 1178842]
Affects: epel-5 [bug 1178843]
libsndfile-1.0.25-9.fc20 has been pushed to the Fedora 20 stable repository.  If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.
libsndfile-1.0.25-14.fc21 has been pushed to the Fedora 21 stable repository.  If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.
*** Bug 1277941 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

blocked.short_desc: CVE-2014-9496 libsndfile: 2 buffer overruns in sd2_parse_rsrc_fork()

long_desc.thetext:
2 buffer overruns were reported in libsndfile, in sd2_parse_rsrc_fork() function [1].
Upstream commit that fixes these issues:
https://github.com/erikd/libsndfile/commit/dbe14f00030af5d3577f4cabbf9861db59e9c378

[1]: https://github.com/erikd/libsndfile/issues/93

A division by zero occurs in aiff.c in aiff_rewrite_header. headIndex is initialized to zero and if all the conditions for modifying it fail, it will be used in division in psf_fwrite, resulting in crash.

Upstream patch:

https://github.com/erikd/libsndfile/commit/725c7dbb95bfaf8b4bb7b04820e3a00cceea9ce6#diff-4b3e9c7e86f66ff8285771969745e133

CVE assignment:

http://seclists.org/oss-sec/2015/q4/218

Created libsndfile tracking bugs for this issue:

Affects: fedora-all [bug 1277942]
Affects: epel-5 [bug 1277943]
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 1177254 ***

Please also mention the CVE IDs being fixed in the RPM changelog and the
